instruction.value: WEEKLY on days 29, 36 and 43. Observe patient for 1 hour post asparaginase.
WEEKLY on DAY 1, 8 and 15. Observe patient for 1 hour post asparaginase.

additionalnotes.value: If abdominal pain present 72 hours or longer AND Amylase is greater than or equal to 3 X WLN: Permanently stop asparaginase. If abdominal pain present less than 72 hours AND Amylase less than 3 X WLN: HOLD asparaginase and resume when values return to baseline. If Amylase greater than or equal to 3 X WLN AND no abdominal pain: Check Lipase; if Lipase above normal: HOLD asparaginase. If Fibrinogen less than 1 g/L: HOLD asparaginase. If Fibrinogen is less than or equal to 0.5 g/L OR Fibrinogen is greater than 0.5 g/L and symptomatic: Give 10 units of cryoprecipitate. Repeat Fibrinogen daily until greater than 1 g/L.
